name: Pipo Park
description:
Pipo Park is a messy and happy digital playground. Explore a small park, play football, throw traffic cones, balls, dogs, and more... Have a nice time!



Features
  • A cute playground to explore ⚽
  • Collect hearts ❤️
  • Collect stars ⭐
  • Local multiplayer, up to 4 players 👨‍👨‍👧‍👧 (requires XBOX-360 controllers)
  • Cute animals 🦆🐕
  • A mage stuck in the ground??? 🧙
